snippet: A day after the Knicks lost their third straight game, Coach Mike Woodson reiterated that he felt the team was capable of making the playoffs. But he also showed some frustration.
abstract: New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson shows frustration after team loses their third straight game; says he still believes they can reach the playoffs; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: A day after the Knicks lost their third straight game, Coach Mike Woodson reiterated that he felt the team was capable of making the playoffs. But he also showed some frustration.
